titleStmt.title: This is a true copy of a letter, that Prince Griffith lately writ to the Lord Windsor; wherein the passages that happened betwixt them in Flaunders are truely related.
titleStmt.author: Griffith, John, of Llyne.
Griffith, John, 1622?-1700, attributed name.
Marbles, Francis.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed, undoubtedly in error, to John Griffith (1622?-1700), the general Baptist minister.
Pp. 6-8 contains a passage commenting on Lord Windsor by Francis Marbles.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
